website_summaries.verdict: Its integrated meat thermometer and easy controls make this electric smoker a fine option for novices and veteran smokers alike.
pros: Includes sausage hooks and rib rack
cons: If you are forced to open its large door, the internal temperature will drop dramatically

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this smoker! It is easy to operate and adds a good amount on smoke. I would highly recommend this smoker. I have done a Boston butt and jerky and very pleased with the out come
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Dyna-Glo electric smoker
customer_reviews.text: Hello So far the Dyna-Glo smoker has been very good and easy to use. It holds temp, the timer works good and probe is good. Overall very happy with the smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: You think at this price they would get it right
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one thinking its going to be great to use. The temperature would swing around a 30° span and it made smoking a lot longer and the first time I pulled it out after smoking a pork butt for 9 hours and it was still really tough. I didnt know what to do but I was definitly upset. I started setting the temp 30° above and it mostly came out right. Has a small leak on the glass seal on the door.
customer_reviews.author: cris

customer_reviews.title: This unit will not smoke @ 275* - kept it there for 2 hrs. several times - NO SMOKE.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine product well built with very good insulation. However, I could not get the unit to smoke at any temp. up to 275*. Had to season unit with my tube smoker. Tried three different chips and one pellet try with each soaked for 30 minutes. None produced smoke @ 275* in 2 hrs. Duplicate above listed with dry chips-275* for 2 hrs. Same results - NO SMOKE. I liked the unit and would buy from them again. W. Cobb
customer_reviews.author: Becky Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Ok smoker, nothing exceptional
customer_reviews.text: Like many of the other reviews, it works okay. It doesn’t hold temps very well, at least the internal thermostat could have a 20 degree swing on the temps occasionally. It can take nearly an hour to get the unit to 250 degrees, so factor that into your smoke time. I live in NC and the exterior temps were about 35 degrees when I started warming it up.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoker
customer_reviews.text: Works good and has a good price. Bluetooth is not very useful in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Draheim

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, impossible to find parts and customer service is not great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 15 smoke sessions. Now as others have listed, the temperature does note accurately hold. I have to crank my smoked salmon cook temp to 275f in order to achieve 130f actual cook temp. I reached out to customer service, explained in detail the problem and Danny explained to me how to load wood chips and not to put charcoal in it. Super helpful :( After back and forth emails, I got a very short, we don't have that part anyway. If you are looking for a pretty smoker that doesn't work to sit outside and look good then get this. If you want a actual working smoker, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Reliability ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price, have used it 5 times, no issues . Love the Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box, did not work
customer_reviews.text: Its nice to look at but it doesn't work. The lights work, even the bluetooth connection worked but there was no heat at all. I put in for a replacement and will see how that turns out, i will update my review and hopefully give it more stars when i can.
customer_reviews.author: trigger01

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about six months now, and have had some major problems with it. After about three months, the meat probe stopped working, so I bought a bluetooth thermometer and discovered a second problem. The internal thermostat consistently read 20-25 degrees too high (It would say 225, my new thermometer would read 200). No wonder it took me so much longer to smoke anything! If you read other comments here, you will see the same complaint, so its not just my machine, but a design flaw. Now that I bought a reliable thermometer, it's working better for me, but I shouldn't have to.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hodina

customer_reviews.title: nope
customer_reviews.text: I really wished that this smoker was great- unfortunately it was junk....we bought $165 worth of Pork shoulders and briskets----The temp did NOT HOLD and after several hours the meat was still RAW. Product was returned to Amazon without any issues--- Sorry but I would not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Super smoker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son-in-law for Christmas. He absolutely loves it. Says it works great!. He’s cooked a whole brisket and smoked some salmon so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker
customer_reviews.text: Going into my second season with this. It has been great. We use it for everything from jerky to brisket to hams to whatever else we think of. Has worked wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: One word, JUNK! Way disappointed. Nobody's talking about how thin the material is. Grab the handle on the back and the smoker bends. Had a big gap when the door was closed. Had to pull the door off and the hinges to adjust. Adjusted the hinges by hand, not good. This project will have a very short life span in my pinion. So unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Ogle

customer_reviews.title: Our first smoker
customer_reviews.text: Our first smoker and we love it. Easy to use. Moderately easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Set it and walk away!
customer_reviews.text: You download the app to your cell phone. Use your favorite recipe for smoking set it and walk away. When your food is done smoking you get a notice on your phone. Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker
customer_reviews.text: This smoker was very easy to set and use, however when we received it the hinges were bent and we were not able to maintain the right temperature. Other than that the smoker works great.
customer_reviews.author: Cher-ray Bellingar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smoker!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this smoker 2x and we LOVE IT!!! Does an awesome job and everything we cooked came out amazing!! A bit pricey but worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Marie C DiMatteo

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little to get used to, once you do very easy. Would decently recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Fendley

customer_reviews.title: Ready to go.
customer_reviews.text: Came packed really good. Not much assembly needed. Can't wait for first usage.
customer_reviews.author: Al Sackmann

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with the smoker. It’s easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: it seems to drop the Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: for electric its ok but i will continue working to get the product better
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Dislike: App has no customizable setup Like: Ease of use and cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Ginjenni

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap, stopped working after 4th use but it was outside the return window. Never will I buy another one of these
customer_reviews.author: harry redkey

customer_reviews.title: burner went out after 1 yr
customer_reviews.text: smoked good , burner coil needs to be covered where it meets connection
customer_reviews.author: darren b.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smoker and I find it easy to use and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard1869

customer_reviews.title: Smokes good
customer_reviews.text: Works good,be patient ribs will take a good 6-7 hours. Seems well built smokes good. It Cooks
customer_reviews.author: BullittFan

customer_reviews.title: Steer Clear! Looks good, works bad!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this smoker and did one cook. It is going back! Why? Bluetooth Range: Maximum distance 20 feet if no walls involved. Could not reach my family room at 18 feet and one wall. Heat: The unit struggles to obtain 275 degrees. I cooked a 7 pound pork butt that should have been done in 6 hours max at 275. At 10 hours the meat reached 180 degrees but 205 degrees is the done temperature.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Worst product from the worst company.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Dyna-Glo charcoal smoker which worked great but was time consuming. I aske my wife to get me a new Dyna-Glo electric smoker for my birthday which she did. I assembled it, plugged it in and nothing. The unit will not turn on. I followed every step and made sure the outlet was GFI as all my outdoor outlets are because my house was built in 2002. It stated in the manual not to return it but to call customer service. It's now my sixth attempt to contact them and I've been on hold each time for over an hour. The unit is now in the trash and I'm purchasing a new one from a reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: dhendo151

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smoker!
customer_reviews.text: I got this smoker as a gift and am thrilled! Set up on the DGU951SDE-D was straightforward and the directions were easy to follow. I got started quickly and it found ample room to fit all my food. Everything I cooked came out well, especially for a first time smoker user. I started with ribs, chicken, pork and even corn on the cob. Highly recommend and would purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B. Evans

product_meta.title: Dyna-Glo DGU951SDE-D Two Door Digital Bluetooth Smoker, Silver
product_meta.description: Style:40” Digital Bluetooth w/ 2 doorBring the classic art of barbecue into the future with the 40" 2-Door digital electric smoker from Dyna-Glo. Digitally set & monitor your cook time & temperature with the push of a button. With the digitally-controlled, integrated meat thermometer, you can keep an eye on the food’s internal Temperature without opening the door, & relax knowing the smoker will turn off when the meat reaches your desired temperature. Designed for easy access & a simplified process, this smoker will have you serving up ribs, sausages & more in no time.
feature_bullets: Four chrome-plated Steel cooking grates offer a total of 951 Square inches in cooking space
Set and monitor cooking time or temperatures with digital thermostat and control panel display
Track the internal temperature of the food without disturbing the cooking process with the integrated meat thermometer
Removable rib rack and sausage hooks offer additional cooking options
Integrated LED illuminates the cooking area at the push of a button.
Access water or wood chips without losing smoke or heat with the bottom access drawer
Adjustable door latches and flexible, high temp door seal help minimize smoke and heat loss
800 watt burner generates plenty of cooking power in colder climates
Rear handle and heavy-duty casters provide convenient mobility

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars85 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
